title: The Marine's Naughty Sister
description: Nate is shocked to find his normally conservative stepsister at a local bar performing a table dance for a number of men from his Marine Corps Unit. Angered and aroused by her actions Nate takes her back to his place to sober her up. Can Nate resist his sister when she decides she wants him to show her how a Marine gets the job done? Ooh-rah!Length: Approx 10,500 words*** Warning: This book contains graphic language and sexual content that some may find offensive. Intended for adults ages 18+***
author: Terry Towers
